m_szDocTitle: Amp to Develop Wirelessly Charged Delivery Trucks
m_szDocSumamry: Amp to Develop Wirelessly Charged Delivery Trucks December 26th, 2012 by Nicholas Brown     Amp Electric Vehicles has decided to start converting the propulsion systems of delivery trucks to electric, and this time, they will be equipped to charge wirelessly. The company used to convert SUVs to electric propulsion systems, but it moved on from that and has now reached an agreement with Momentum Dynamics to convert delivery trucks, using one of the latest charging technologies: resonant induction charging.
